type.name: security_classification_item
type.description: A security_classification_item specifies those objects to which a security_classification may be assigned.

type.name: security_classification_approval_item
type.description: A security_classification_approval_item extends approval assignment to security_classification instances.

type.name: security_classification_date_item
type.description: A security_classification_date_item extends date assignment to security_classification instances.

type.name: security_classification_date_and_time_item
type.description: A security_classification_date_and_time_item extends date and time assignment to security_classification instances.

type.name: security_classification_organization_item
type.description: An security_classification_organization_item extends organization assignment to security_classification instances.

type.name: security_classification_person_and_organization_item
type.description: A security_classification_person_and_organization_item extends person and organization assignment to security_classification instances.

type.name: security_classification_alias_identification_item
type.description: A security_classification_alias_identification_item extends alias identification to security_classification instances.
